CustomField.description: Unique ID for the Pricing Plan. For the base product, this is the tier ID and for the add ons, this is the add on pricing plan ID. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines and is used across multiple products based on the Product Type (ex: same ID for Employee or Contractor). For Payroll Product Types, field will be blank. All Payroll Product Types are queried when adding Opportunity Line Items.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Unique ID for the Pricing Plan. For the base product, this is the tier ID and for the add ons, this is the add on pricing plan ID. This field matches the value we receive in ZP Product Lines and is used across multiple products based on the Product Type (ex: same ID for Employee or Contractor). For Payroll Product Types, field will be blank. All Payroll Product Types are queried when adding Opportunity Line Items.
CustomField.label: Pricing Plan ID
